text: Di madagoaa digaula ne hai baahi gi mee, gaa hai nadau helekai huaidu i mee, gei mee ga hai baahi ga duidui nia dogolia ono gahu, ga helekai gi digaula, “Maa goodou ga ihala, goodou hua ne bida haga ihala goodou, gei au e hagalee dau gi di godou haga ihala goodou. Tugi dolomeenei gaa hana gi muli, gei au gaa hana gi baahi digau tuadimee.”
